long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extensions purpose is to redesign Utah Techs computing site. It was abandoned by the school years ago, but continues to be used by hundreds of computing students each semester. Currently the site looks very old with broken links and a drop down menu of 50 items. Here are some changes we made. Added a sidebar, nicer colors, removed broken links, cleaned up the messy header.
